full_summary:
_____________________
### Government Tender Announcement 

[**Tender Details**]

* **Tender Title (English)**: Field Row Crop Planter
* **Tender Title (French)**: Semoir en ligne cultures de plein champ
* **Reference Number**: WS3756846589-Doc3889043028
* **Amendment Number**: 1

### Tender Overview

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3756846589
* **Publication Date**: March 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 23, 2023 (1400 EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 10, 2024

### Contract Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Not specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Portage la Prairie, Manitoba
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contractor Requirements

* **End User Entities**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* **Contractor Requirements**: See detailed tender description below

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires one (1) new Field Row Crop Planter for the Portage la Prairie Research and Development Centre. The bid solicitation cancels and supersedes a previous solicitation with a closing date of January 31, 2023. Bidders who submitted proposals for the previous solicitation will receive a debriefing session upon request.

**Important Update**: The closing time for submission of bids has been extended to May 23, 2023, at 1400 EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Douglas Rachinski, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email**: douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: Not available
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15522221?extsite=MTU1MjIyMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15522221?extsite=
